install.name: Search module 1
install.author: Vince Wooll
install.description: Search module 1. Requires Jomres v3 and upwards

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: useCols
param.label: Show as columns
param.description: Any search option that you have defined as link type (where pertinent) will be shown as columns (IE br put on the end of the link)

param.name: featurecols
param.label: Feature columns
param.description: The number of feature icons that can be shown before a br is inserted to go to next row.

param.name: selectcombo
param.label: Search region by select combo dropdown
param.description: Offer a search dropdown to filter through countries/regions/towns

param.name: propertyname
param.label: Search by property name
param.description: Show the search by property name input

param.name: propertyname_dropdown
param.label: Show as dropdown?
param.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

param.name: ptype
param.label: Search by property type
param.description: Show the search by property type input

param.name: ptype_dropdown
param.label: Show as dropdown?
param.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

param.name: room_type
param.label: Search by room type
param.description: Show the search by room type input

param.name: room_type_dropdown
param.label: Show as dropdown?
param.description: Set this to no to show the list as links

param.name: features
param.label: Search by features
param.description: Show the search by feature input

param.name: features_dropdown
param.label: Show as dropdown?
param.description: Set this to no to show the list as overlib images and checkboxes

param.name: description
param.label: Search bydescription
param.description: Show the search by description input

param.name: availability
param.label: Search by availability
param.description: Show the search by availability input

param.name: priceranges
param.label: Search by price ranges
param.description: Show the search by price ranges input

param.name: pricerange_increments
param.label: Price range increments
param.description: Jomres will look at all the values in the tariffs then work out a series of price ranges based on the increments value you set here.
